ExceptionPipe
PipesErrorhandling
Pipe that throws an exception based on the input message.
Parameters that are set on the ExceptionPipe will be added to the error message that is produced by the org.frankframework.errormessageformatters.ErrorMessageFormatter that has been configured on the org.frankframework.core.Adapter and will also be copied into the PipeLineSession, so that they can be passed back to a calling adapter as returnedSessionKey.
The success forward is only used when the (deprecated) attribute throwException has been set to false. Otherwise, the (default) exception forward will be used.

The attribute throwException has been deprecated and thus the success forward will be removed along with the throwException attribute.
